pages.text: Astikor Carts Redux adds horse-drawn carts to Minecraft, making travel and farming much easier. Hitch up your horse or mule and hit the road in style!
Plow Cart: Till a 3x3 area of land at once. Ideal for preparing your fields quickly and efficiently.
Supply Cart: Carry extra items while traveling. Perfect for long journeys where you need to bring more supplies.
Animal Cart: Bring your furry friends along on your journey. This cart allows you to transport animals with ease.
How to Hitch Your Horse: To hitch your horse to a cart, simply right-click on the cart with a Lead while your horse is nearby. Ready your cart and enjoy the journey!
